search.query: |tstats count where `gcp_index` sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message data.protoPayload.serviceName != "" data.resource.type != "" by data.resource.type

panel.title: GCP - # of Activity Events by Source

search.query: |tstats count where `gcp_index` sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message data.protoPayload.serviceName!="" by source

panel.title: GCP - Count of Activities by Users

search.query: |tstats count where `gcp_index` sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message data.protoPayload.serviceName!="" data.resource.type!="" by _time, data.protoPayload.serviceName, data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail |rename "data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail" as username | timechart count by username useother=false usenull=false

panel.title: GCP - Count of Events by User and Severity

search.query: |tstats count where `gcp_index` sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message "data.logName"="*logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity*" by "data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail", data.severity | rename data.severity as severity, "data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail" as "UserName" |chart sum(count) by UserName, severity

`gcp_index` sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message "logName"="*logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity*" | rename data.protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail as Username | eval Username=if(Username=="", "Unknown", Username) | stats count by Username, data.protoPayload.request.@type | rename data.protoPayload.request.@type as "Event Type" | sort -count | rename count as Count | table Username, "Event Type", Count
`gcp_index` sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message severity=*ERROR* | stats count by data.protoPayload.serviceName
